ygData.subject: Re: You're here!
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Was wondering what level your skill is in ordered to make decent money like that? I m a master brewer by the way, and am looking to expand into other
ygData.messageBody:
>From: Nick Emmerich <seorin@...>
>
>I'm out here :) Guess us potters aren't too popular, but we're the ones
>that
>get the money =P You should see the EQBrewers list... they're excited about
>new items (understandable) and are hoping to make more than 30 plat an hour
>with it. I can make at least twice that with my lovely potting skill :)
>Gotta love it
>-Rennin of E'Ci
> Trade Council GM

Was wondering what level your skill is in ordered to make decent money like
that? I'm a master brewer by the way, and am looking to expand into other
skills.
